Articles.Content:
Hi

This is just to inform you that blizzys Achievements mod, seems to still work in 1.0!

I did not get all of them but the basic ones seem to work just fine :-)

So if you can't live without them like me grab it here: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/52535-0-24-2-Achievements-1-6-3-Earn-136-achievements-while-playing](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/52535-0-24-2-Achievements-1-6-3-Earn-136-achievements-while-playing)

Thanks blizzy for that awesome mod!
